TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityDesignerVerb extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

Docs.summary: 使用关联的谓词组、文本和事件处理程序创建要与设计器一起使用的新谓词。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> 描述要对工作流组件采取的操作。 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> 选项可在设计时显示在菜单栏和右键上下文菜单中。
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> 将在设计时和与同一个 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> 关联的其他谓词分组在一起并显示在相应子菜单中。
从菜单中选择这个新谓词时，将调用创建此谓词时传递的事件处理程序。
